main event: A stationary green and white disc was observed over Ping Geung, Formosa, for approximately 15 minutes on January 12, 1959.
interesting points: The object remained stationary and the bat could not close in on it.,The object faded from sight after the observation.,This incident was documented by the Air Force under Project Blue Book.,There was no definite conclusion reached regarding the object's nature.,The sighting was classified under ground-radar type observation.
